snippet: The Cavaliers’ All-Star guard, Kyrie Irving, will miss Saturday’s game against the Nets with a bruised left knee. He also sat out Thursday’s home win over Orlando.
lead_paragraph: The Cavaliers’ All-Star guard, Kyrie Irving, will miss Saturday’s game against the Nets with a bruised left knee. He also sat out Thursday’s home win over Orlando.

headline.main: Cavaliers’ Irving Will Miss Game Against Nets
headline.print_headline: Irving Will Miss Game Against Nets
